Title: Bottomless
Plot: The investigation into a pair of missing pants leads to the murder of a young lawyer. Lupo and Green soon turn their suspicions to a businessman who works for a shady multinational corporation called SavingsMart.
GuestStars: Will Chase, Roxanna Hope, Kaitlin Hopkins, John Cunningham, Elizabeth Norment, Guenia Lemos, Ron Canada, David Drake, J. Tucker Smith, Richard Poe, Les J.N. Mau, Karen Huie, Fay Ann Lee, Jim Coope, Mary Bacon, Ezra
